Class PropertiesXMLCreator

  • java.lang.Object
    • java.util.Observable
      • view.GUI.BasicWindow
        • presenter.PropertiesXMLCreator
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    java.lang.Runnable

    public class PropertiesXMLCreator
extends BasicWindow
    Quick setup window - asks user to choose main parameters before starting game, and saves the parameters into a XML file.
    Author:
    Tomer
